sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {Line,Pie} from 'react-chartjs-2' import NumberFormat from 'react-number-format' const {sum, getAllMonth} = require ("../../util/library") const Grafik = (props)=>{ let dataCovid = null; let data = null; if (!props.isGlobal) { dataCovid=getAllMonth(props); data = { labels :dataCovid.label, datasets:[ { label:"Jumlah Positif", fill : false, lineTension:0.1, backgroundColor:'rgba(229,56,50,0.4)', borderColor:'rgba(229,56,56,1)', borderCapStyle:'butt', borderDash:[], borderDashOffset:0.0, borderJoinStyle:'miter', pointBorderColor:'rgba(229,56,56,1)', pointBackgroundColor:'#fff', pointBorderWidth:1, pointHoverRadius:10, pointHoverBackgroundColor:'rgba(229,56,56,1)', pointHoverBorderColor:'rgba(220,220,220,1)', pointBorderWidth:2, pointHitRadius:10, data: dataCovid.positif }, { label:"Jumlah Sembuh", fill : false, lineTension:0.1, backgroundColor:'rgba(75,192,192,0.4)', borderColor:'rgba(75,192,192,1)', borderCapStyle:'butt', borderDash:[], borderDashOffset:0.0, borderJoinStyle:'miter', pointBorderColor:'rgba(75,192,192,1)', pointBackgroundColor:'#fff', pointBorderWidth:1, pointHoverRadius:10, pointHoverBackgroundColor:'rgba(75,192,192,1)', pointHoverBorderColor:'rgba(220,220,220,1)', pointBorderWidth:2, pointHitRadius:10, data: dataCovid.sembuh }, { label:"Jumlah Meninggal", fill : false, lineTension:0.1, backgroundColor:'rgba(0,0,0,0.4)', borderColor:'rgba(0,0,0,0.4)', borderCapStyle:'butt', borderDash:[], borderDashOffset:0.0, borderJoinStyle:'miter', pointBorderColor:'rgba(0,0,0,0.4)', pointBackgroundColor:'#fff', pointBorderWidth:1, pointHoverRadius:10, pointHoverBackgroundColor:'rgba(0,0,0,0.4)', pointHoverBorderColor:'rgba(220,220,220,1)', pointBorderWidth:2, pointHitRadius:10, data: dataCovid.meninggal }, { label:"Jumlah Active", fill : false, lineTension:0.1, backgroundColor:'rgba(232,243,16,0.4)', borderColor:'rgba(232,243,16,0.4)', borderCapStyle:'butt', borderDash:[], borderDashOffset:0.0, borderJoinStyle:'miter', pointBorderColor:'rgba(232,243,16,0.4)', pointBackgroundColor:'#fff', pointBorderWidth:1, pointHoverRadius:10, pointHoverBackgroundColor:'rgba(232,243,16,0.4)', pointHoverBorderColor:'rgba(220,220,220,1)', pointBorderWidth:2, pointHitRadius:10, data: dataCovid.meninggal }, ] } } const dataPie ={ labels:[ 'Positif', 'Sembuh', 'Meninggal' ], datasets:[{ data:[sum('Confirmed',props),sum('Recovered',props),sum('Deaths',props)], backgroundColor:['#ff6384','#36a2eb','#ffce56'], pointHoverBackgroundColor:[ '#ff6384','#36a2eb','#ffce56' ] } ] } return (

{props.isGlobal ? "Statistik Virus Corona Di Dunia":"Virus Corona Di Indonesia"}

{props.isGlobal ? : }
Positif

Orang

Sembuh

Orang

Meninggal

Orang

) } export default Grafik;
